summary: Provides utilities to generate Jinja2 template files that encode MODFLOW‑6 input blocks, converting USGS definition (DFN) specifications into ready‑to‑use template code and handling special sections such as binary lists and griddata.
business_intent: Automate and standardize the creation of MODFLOW‑6 model configuration files, reducing manual effort and errors while aligning model inputs with official USGS definitions.
